abstract: Abortion clinic workers Andrea Morton and Sherry West plead guilty to third-degree murder at a Philadelphia clinic where seven babies were allegedly killed with scissors and a patient died from an overdose of painkillers; neither worker was properly trained for the tasks they did at the clinic, which was run by Dr Kermit Gosnell, who, along with nine other employees, has been charged with performing illegal late-term abortions.
snippet: Two abortion clinic workers pleaded guilty on Thursday to third-degree murder at a Philadelphia clinic where seven babies were allegedly killed with scissors.
lead_paragraph: Two abortion clinic workers pleaded guilty on Thursday to third-degree murder at a Philadelphia clinic where seven babies were allegedly killed with scissors.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Clinic Workers Plead Guilty to Murder
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Clinic Workers Plead Guilty to Murder
headline.seo: Abortion Clinic Workers Plead Guilty to Murder
